subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Danish center Frans Nielsen agreed to a four-year, $2.1 million contract with the Islanders. Nielsen, the first Danish citizen to play in the N.H.L., had two goals and an assist in 16 games with the Islanders last season.
